title: PHP Developer
description:
- You will work as a PHP developer to build a stock portal system for foreign customer
- Work in other project under your direct managers' instructions
- Understand the design documents and implement them properly.
- Work directly with Japanese client to clarify requirement
- Opportunities to work onsite oversea (Japanese level above or equivalent to N2)
requirements:
- 2-5 years experience as PHP Developer and/or at least one of PHP related frameworks such as Laravel, Yii2...
- Familiar with working style of Japanese customer is a plus
- Be able to handle tasks individually or in big team size.
